about:
I am an aspiring software developer with a passion for coding and problem-solving. I have solved over **450+ problems** on **LeetCode**, ranking at **1605**, which places me in the **top 20% globally**. This has significantly sharpened my skills in **data structures and algorithms**.

In addition to my competitive programming accomplishments, I worked as a **Subject Matter Expert (SME) in Computer Science** at **Chegg**, where I helped students understand complex concepts and provided detailed solutions to programming challenges. This experience not only reinforced my technical knowledge but also honed my ability to explain difficult topics clearly and effectively.

My technical expertise includes **C++, Java, and JavaScript**. I am constantly looking for new challenges that allow me to apply and expand my knowledge. I am driven by a desire to create efficient, scalable solutions and am eager to contribute to meaningful projects that make a real impact.

In my free time, I enjoy learning new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and working on personal projects to further develop my skills. My goal is to keep evolving as a developer and collaborate on innovative and impactful solutions.
